patient_information: Age: 25 years Sex: female Hiv status: positive Travel history: Zambia Symptoms onset: new-onset seizure Comorbidities: none reported Immunosuppression: advanced due to HIV infection Vaccination status: unknown Allergy info: unknown
chief_complaint: Symptoms: new-onset seizures Duration: recently diagnosed
history_of_present_illness: Timeline: recent onset of symptoms Key symptoms: seizures, altered mental status Pertinent negatives: no history of similar episodes Severity pattern: acute onset with rapid progression
exposure_and_epidemiology: Residence travel: Zambia Vectors animals: unknown Water food risks: unknown Contacts season outbreak: unknown Occupation: hospital cafeteria worker
vitals: Temperature: normal Blood pressure: normal Heart rate: normal Respiratory rate: normal Oxygen saturation: normal
physical_exam: General appearance: well-appearing Mental status: GCS 15/15 Neurological examination: unremarkable System reviews: no focal deficits, clear chest on auscultation
labs_and_diagnostics: Blood results: {"wbc": "5.8 × 10^9/L (4–10)", "hemoglobin": "11.0 g/dL (12–14)", "platelets": "215 × 10^9/L (150–350)", "cd4_count": "153 cells/μL (500–1200)", "serum_sodium": "135 mmol/L (130–145)", "serum_glucose": "4.5 mmol/L (3.9–5.5)"} Csf results: {"leukocytes": "5 cells/μL (0–5)", "protein": "0.78 g/L (0.25–0.55)", "glucose": "2.9 mmol/L (2.25–2.97)", "cryptococcal_antigen": "negative", "india_ink_stain": "negative", "gram_stain": "negative", "ziehl_neelsen_stain": "negative"} Additional tests: {"malaria_rapid_test": "negative", "albuninuria": "normal", "cryptococcal_antigen": "negative", "india_ink_stain": "negative", "gram_stain": "negative", "ziehl_neelsen_stain": "negative"}
differential_diagnosis: Considered conditions: ["epilepsy", "tuberculosis meningitis", "cryptococcal meningitis", "progressive multifocal leukoencephalopathy (PML)", "cerebral toxoplasmosis"] Evidence for: {"epilepsy": "new-onset seizures, focal slowing on EEG", "tuberculosis meningitis": "normal CSF protein and glucose levels", "cryptococcal meningitis": "negative cryptococcal antigen test", "PML": "low CD4 count, normal CSF protein level", "cerebral toxoplasmosis": "no history of toxoplasmosis"} Evidence against: {"epilepsy": "normal CSF findings, no history of similar episodes", "tuberculosis meningitis": "negative India ink stain and gram stain", "cryptococcal meningitis": "negative cryptococcal antigen test", "PML": "no history of immunosuppression or exposure to Epstein-Barr virus", "cerebral toxoplasmosis": "normal CSF findings, no history of toxoplasmosis"}
management_and_clinical_course: Initial treatment: phenobarbital for seizure control Antiretroviral therapy: started on ART Clinical improvement: seizure-free after 6 months Drug adjustments: carbamazepine added, phenobarbital stopped Outcome: remained seizure-free for 1 year
final_diagnosis: Diagnosis: progressive multifocal leukoencephalopathy (PML) Confirmation method: low CD4 count and normal CSF protein level Evidence for: {"CD4_count": "low CD4 count", "CSF_protein_level": "normal CSF protein level"} Evidence against: {"epilepsy": "no history of similar episodes, normal CSF findings", "tuberculosis meningitis": "negative India ink stain and gram stain", "cryptococcal meningitis": "negative cryptococcal antigen test", "cerebral toxoplasmosis": "normal CSF findings"}
